total_revenue.context: Q3 2023 revenue was $7.84 billion, up 14% year-over-year or 19% in constant currency.

Sales_Cloud.context: Sales Cloud grew 12% year-over-year and 17% in constant currency.

Service_Cloud.context: Service Cloud grew 12% year-over-year and 16% in constant currency, approaching $2 billion in revenue.

Marketing_and_Commerce_Cloud.context: Marketing and Commerce Clouds grew 12% year-over-year and 18% in constant currency.

Platform_and_Other.context: Platform and Other segments, including MuleSoft and Tableau, grew 13% year-over-year or 16% in constant currency.

Slack.context: Slack grew 46% year-over-year, handling more than 2.6 billion actions every day.

gaap_diluted_eps.context: Q3 GAAP Earnings Per Share was $0.21.

non_gaap_diluted_eps.context: Q3 non-GAAP Earnings Per Share was $1.40.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow for Q3 was $115 million, down 52% year-over-year.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow for Q3 was $313 million, down 23% year-over-year.

capital_expenditures.context: CapEx for Q3 was $198 million, resulting in free cash flow of $115 million.

ai_predictions.context: Einstein Artificial Intelligence platform is generating 194 billion predictions every single day.

learners.context: Salesforce has 18 million Trailblazers in its community.

jobs_created.context: Data not provided in the Q3 2023 earnings call.

business_revenues.context: Data not provided in the Q3 2023 earnings call.

market_position.description: Salesforce remains the #1 CRM provider by market share for the ninth year in a row.
initiatives: Maintaining leadership in CRM across sales, service, marketing, commerce, communities, integration, and app development.
Integrating Slack into the Customer 360 platform to enhance collaboration capabilities.
goals: Enhance collaboration and communication through Slack integration.
examples: Integration of Slack to create a Slack-first Customer 360.
Continued leadership in CRM as rated by IDC and Gartner.

innovation.description: Focus on Customer 360, AI innovations, and integration of Slack.
initiatives: Enhancing Customer 360 to provide unified customer views with Slack integration.
Advancing AI capabilities with Einstein to support customer success.
Expanding Salesforce Blockchain and other innovative solutions to meet customer needs.
goals: Empower customers with AI and blockchain capabilities.
Provide unified customer experiences through integrated platforms.
Drive workforce development and ecosystem growth.
examples: Integration of Slack in the Customer 360 platform.
Slack-First Customer 360 making Salesforce products more powerful and effective.
Introduction of Genie, the Customer Data Cloud.

share_repurchases.description: Authorization of up to $10 billion in share repurchase program.
initiatives: Repurchasing shares to generate shareholder value.
examples: Board of Directors authorized up to $10 billion in share repurchases.
Returned $1.7 billion to shareholders during Q3.

ecosystem_development.description: Growth of Salesforce ecosystem through Trailhead, strategic partnerships, and Slack integration.
initiatives: Expanding Trailhead to support continuous learning and reskilling.
Enhancing My Trailhead for customers to create branded learning experiences.
Strengthening strategic partnerships with global brands like IBM, Amazon, Microsoft, and Alibaba.
Integrating Slack to enhance the collaborative ecosystem.
goals: Create more than 3 million jobs and $860 billion in GDP impact worldwide by 2022.
Provide over 1 million Americans with Salesforce credentials.
Contribute to 4.2 million new jobs and $1.2 trillion in new business revenues worldwide from 2019 through 2024.
examples: Accenture leveraging My Trailhead for employee reskilling.
Partnership with Alibaba to support multinational customers.
IBM building their Customer 360 on Salesforce and Slack integration.

social_initiatives.description: Enhanced support for nonprofits, commitment to sustainability, and integration of Slack.
initiatives: Delivering $450 million in grants and 6 million volunteer hours.
Achieving net zero gas emissions globally and providing a carbon-neutral cloud to customers.
Committing to 100% renewable energy for global operations by 2022.
Integrating Slack to support collaborative and sustainable work environments.
goals: Empower nonprofit, education, and philanthropy customers to fulfill their missions.
Reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability.
examples: Salesforce.org supporting 51,000 nonprofits with free services.
$450 million in grants delivered to various causes.
Carbon-neutral cloud and commitment to renewable energy initiatives.

revenue_growth.expectation: Continued growth driven by multi-cloud adoption, industry solutions, and geographical expansion despite economic headwinds.
revenue_growth.constant_currency_growth: Expected to remain strong or accelerate in upcoming quarters.
factors: Growth in Salesforce platform and cloud services.
Successful integration of acquisitions like Slack.
Increased demand for digital transformation and customer experience solutions.

fy_2023.context: Fiscal year 2023 revenue guidance maintained at $30.9 billion to $31.0 billion, representing approximately 17% growth year-over-year or 20% in constant currency.

fy_2026.context: Revenue target of $50 billion by fiscal year 2026.

revenue.context: Q4 2023 revenue guidance of $7.82 billion to $7.83 billion, up approximately 14% year-over-year.

crpo_growth.context: Q4 CRPO growth of approximately 12% year-over-year, or 15% in constant currency.

gaap_diluted_eps.context: Q4 GAAP EPS guidance of $0.23 to $0.25.

non_gaap_diluted_eps.context: Q4 non-GAAP EPS guidance of $1.35 to $1.37.

revenue.context: Fiscal year 2023 revenue guidance maintained at $30.9 billion to $31.0 billion, representing approximately 17% growth year-over-year or 20% in constant currency.

operating_margin.context: Fiscal year 2023 non-GAAP operating margin guidance raised to 20.7%, an increase of 200 basis points year-over-year.

capex.context: Fiscal year 2023 CapEx expected to be approximately 2.5% of revenue.

gaap_diluted_eps.context: Fiscal year 2023 GAAP diluted EPS guidance of $0.55 to $0.57.

non_gaap_diluted_eps.context: Fiscal year 2023 non-GAAP diluted EPS guidance of $4.92 to $4.94.

operating_cash_flow_growth.context: Fiscal year 2023 operating cash flow guidance updated to approximately 17% growth year-over-year.

drivers: Continued investment in AI and commercial sales capacity.

expense_outlook_excluding_accrual.note: Expense outlook essentially unchanged excluding Salesforce.org-related expenses.

core_trends: Continued investment in cloud and AI.
Strategic acquisitions to enhance product offerings.

operating_environment_challenges: Integration of Genie and Slack acquisitions.
Managing foreign exchange (FX) headwinds impacting revenue growth.
Balancing investments in cloud and AI with profitability.
Adapting to competitive pressures in cloud and CRM markets.
Scaling operations to support rapid growth in key segments like Sales Cloud and Service Cloud.
Ongoing impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic and geopolitical tensions on operations, customer behavior, and economic conditions.
